sentences.en: Frankly, Thomas, this question of your loan is beginning to worry me.
sentences.cn: 老实讲，托马斯，你贷款的问题开始让我担心了。

sentences.en: He had offered the loan of his small villa at Cap Ferrat.
sentences.cn: 他愿意借出在费拉角的小别墅。

sentences.en: He was declared bankrupt after failing to pay a £114m loan guarantee.
sentences.cn: 由于无力偿还1.14亿英镑的贷款担保，他被宣布破产。

sentences.en: He was offered a £10,000 interest-free loan.
sentences.cn: 他获得了1万英镑的无息贷款。

sentences.en: His image was tarnished by the savings and loan scandal.
sentences.cn: 他的形象因为那桩储蓄信贷丑闻而受损。

sentences.en: I had to take out a loan to buy my car.
sentences.cn: 我只得贷款买车。

sentences.en: If you ask him for a loan, he'll come through.
sentences.cn: 如果你向他贷款，他会满足你的要求的。

sentences.en: Interest had pushed the loan up to $27,000.
sentences.cn: 利息已经使得贷款金额提高到了27,000美元。

sentences.en: It’ll be years before we’ve paid off the loan.
sentences.cn: 我们要过好几年才能还清贷款。

sentences.en: Many loan application forms automatically add on insurance.
sentences.cn: 许多贷款申请表自动附加保险。

sentences.en: Now is the time to touch him for a loan.
sentences.cn: 现在是向他借笔钱的时候了。

sentences.en: Someone with an income of $34,895 can afford this loan.
sentences.cn: 一个收入为34,895美元的人能负担得起这笔贷款。

sentences.en: Thanks for the loan of your camera.
sentences.cn: 谢谢你借相机给我。

sentences.en: The bank is happy to loan money to small businesses.
sentences.cn: 银行乐于贷款给小型企业。

sentences.en: The bank might think you're worthy of a loan.
sentences.cn: 银行也许会认为你具备贷款的条件。

sentences.en: The company is in default on the loan.
sentences.cn: 这家公司拖欠借款。

sentences.en: The company won't keep going unless we can get some loan.
sentences.cn: 除非我们能搞到贷款，否则公司就维持不下去了。

sentences.en: The loan is repayable over twenty years.
sentences.cn: 这笔贷款要在20年内还清。

sentences.en: The loan is secured against your home.
sentences.cn: 这笔贷款以你的房子作为抵押。

sentences.en: the painting is at present on loan to the Tate Gallery.
sentences.cn: 那幅画现在借给了泰特美术馆。

sentences.en: The survey claims loan companies prey on weak families already in debt.
sentences.cn: 这项调查声称信贷公司专对那些已经负债的弱势家庭下手。

sentences.en: To the north are the hot springs of Banyas de Sant Loan.
sentences.cn: 北边是班亚斯德桑隆温泉。

sentences.en: We obtained a loan from the government.
sentences.cn: 我们得了一笔政府贷款。
